channel.title: [Delta]Random Item Error

item.title: [Delta]Random Item Error
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

To explain your error instead of all this copy and paste bullshit

is invalid, because the application thinks that the line ends after donator = 1 due to your parentheses usage. You have to have a second set of parentheses to encapsulate the entire line of code, so it should look like this

or

That way java knows that the entire line is one action instead of it reading it as an action and a return

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]Random Item Error
item.dc:creator: @mrpyro3 mrpyro3
item.description:
@mrpyro3 wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:1, topic:407373”]I added this code,

if(donator =1) && (playerRights >=2); if(playerHasItem(7297) && playerHasItem(7299) && playerHasItem(7302) && playerHasItem(6084) && playerHasItem(432) && playerHasItem(709)) { addItem(Item.randomBarrows(), 20); addItem(4740, misc.random(35));

And i get this error

client.java:14035: illegal start of expression if(donator =1) && (playerRights >=2); ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .
What is it talking about[/quote]
Try this:

if (donator == 1 && playerRights >=2) { if(playerHasItem(7297) && playerHasItem(7299) && playerHasItem(7302) && playerHasItem(6084) && playerHasItem(432) && playerHasItem(709; addItem(Item.randomBarrows(), 20); addItem(4740, misc.random(35)): }

Read full topic
